snippet: Administrators at several campuses said it was students who brought the issue to their attention, part of a push to accommodate transgender students.
abstract: Growing number of colleges are adapting their health plans to cover the specific needs of transgender students, including hormone therapy and gender reassignment surgery; rapid shift follows decade of activism and an increased visibility on campus.
lead_paragraph: Administrators at several campuses said it was students who brought the issue to their attention, part of a push to accommodate transgender students.

headline.seo: Transgender Students Gain Visibility, and College Health Plans Respond
headline.main: College Health Plans Respond as Transgender Students Gain Visibility
headline.print_headline: College Health Plans Respond as Transgender Students Gain Visibility
